SELECT SUD.USER_ID, SU.USER_NM, SUD.DLG_SEQ, SUD.DLG_UID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM SY_USER WHERE USER_ID = SUD.DLG_UID) AS DLG_NM, SUD.DLG_DT, SUD.GBK_DT, SUD.DLG_REA, SUD.DLG_PROC_CD, SUD.DLG_APR_REQ_IDX, SUD.RJT_UID, SUD.RJT_DS, SUD.RJT_REA, SUD.DLG_STT_CD, (SELECT DTL_NM FROM SY_CD_DTL WHERE DTL_CD = SUD.DLG_PROC_CD) AS DLG_PROC_NM, SU.PLNT_CD, SU.USER_LOGN_ID FROM SY_USER_DLG SUD LEFT JOIN SY_USER SU ON SUD.USER_ID = SU.USER_ID WHERE SUD.DLG_PROC_CD = 'S0150200'
AND SUD.DLG_STT_CD = #{dlgSttCd}
AND SU.USER_NM LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{userNm}) || '%'
AND SUD.DLG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{dlgDtList[0]}) AND TO_DATE(#{dlgDtList[1]})
ORDER BY SUD.DLG_SEQ DESC
